subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Fans of the New York Mets reacted to the team’s finishing a four-game sweep of the Chicago Cubs in the National League Championship Series and expressed their hopes for the Mets in the World Series.
snippet: Fans of the New York Mets reacted to the team’s finishing a four-game sweep of the Chicago Cubs in the National League Championship Series and expressed their hopes for the Mets in the World Series.
